desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by #1[i]%. When the wearer hits an enemy target, inflicts Mirage Fizzle on the enemy, lasting for 1 turn. Each time the wearer attacks, this effect can only trigger 1 time on each target. The wearer deals #2[i]% increased DMG to targets afflicted with Mirage Fizzle, and the DMG dealt by the wearer's Ultimate additionally increases by #3[i]%.
